categories.name: Textbooks
categories.description: Comprehensive chemistry textbooks covering all major branches

items.title: General Chemistry: Principles and Modern Applications
items.author: Ralph H. Petrucci, F. Geoffrey Herring, Jeffry D. Madura, Carey Bissonnette
items.description: A comprehensive textbook covering fundamental principles of chemistry with modern applications.

items.title: Organic Chemistry
items.author: Paula Yurkanis Bruice
items.description: Clear, comprehensive, and accessible introduction to organic chemistry with extensive problem sets.

items.title: Physical Chemistry: Thermodynamics, Structure, and Change
items.author: Peter Atkins, Julio de Paula
items.description: Comprehensive coverage of physical chemistry principles including thermodynamics, kinetics, and quantum mechanics.

items.title: Inorganic Chemistry
items.author: Gary L. Miessler, Paul J. Fischer, Donald A. Tarr
items.description: Modern approach to inorganic chemistry with emphasis on molecular orbital theory and bonding.

items.title: Analytical Chemistry: An Introduction
items.author: Douglas A. Skoog, Donald M. West, F. James Holler, Stanley R. Crouch
items.description: Introduction to modern analytical chemistry covering both classical and instrumental methods.

categories.name: Reference Books
categories.description: Essential reference materials for chemistry research and study

items.title: CRC Handbook of Chemistry and Physics
items.author: William M. Haynes (Editor)
items.description: The most comprehensive reference for physical and chemical data, constants, and formulas.

items.title: The Merck Index: An Encyclopedia of Chemicals, Drugs, and Biologicals
items.author: Maryadele J. O'Neil (Editor)
items.description: Comprehensive encyclopedia of chemicals, drugs, and biological substances with monographs.

items.title: March's Advanced Organic Chemistry: Reactions, Mechanisms, and Structure
items.author: Michael B. Smith
items.description: Comprehensive reference covering organic reaction mechanisms and structures.

categories.name: Online Resources
categories.description: Free and premium online chemistry resources and databases

items.title: Khan Academy - Chemistry
items.author: Khan Academy
items.description: Free online courses covering chemistry from basics to advanced topics with video lectures and practice problems.

items.title: ChemSpider
items.author: Royal Society of Chemistry
items.description: Free chemical structure database providing access to over 100 million structures from hundreds of data sources.

items.title: PubChem
items.author: National Center for Biotechnology Information
items.description: Open chemistry database at the National Institutes of Health (NIH) containing information on millions of compounds.

items.title: Chemistry LibreTexts
items.author: LibreTexts Project
items.description: Free, open-access textbook library covering all areas of chemistry with peer-reviewed content.

items.title: Wolfram Alpha Chemistry
items.author: Wolfram Research
items.description: Computational chemistry tool for calculations, molecular properties, and chemical reactions.

categories.name: Research Papers
categories.description: Important research papers and journal articles in chemistry

items.title: The Nobel Prize in Chemistry 2020: Development of CRISPR-Cas9
items.author: Emmanuelle Charpentier, Jennifer A. Doudna
items.description: Nobel Prize-winning work on the development of a method for genome editing.

items.title: Green Chemistry: Principles and Practice
items.author: Paul T. Anastas, John C. Warner
items.description: Foundational paper on the principles and practices of green chemistry.

items.title: Metal-Organic Frameworks: A New Class of Porous Materials
items.author: Omar M. Yaghi
items.journal: Journal of the American Chemical Society
items.description: Seminal work on the synthesis and properties of metal-organic frameworks (MOFs).

categories.name: Video Lectures
categories.description: Educational video series and lecture courses

items.title: MIT OpenCourseWare: Introduction to Solid State Chemistry
items.author: Prof. Donald Sadoway
items.description: Complete MIT course on solid-state chemistry with video lectures and course materials.

items.title: Coursera: Advanced Chemistry
items.author: Various Instructors
items.description: Comprehensive online course series covering advanced chemistry topics with interactive assignments.

items.title: Crash Course Chemistry
items.author: Hank Green
items.description: Entertaining and educational video series covering chemistry fundamentals in an accessible way.

items.title: Avogadro - Molecular Editor and Visualizer
items.author: Open Source Community
items.description: Free, open-source molecular editor and visualizer for computational chemistry and molecular modeling.

items.title: ChemDraw
items.author: PerkinElmer
items.description: Industry-standard chemical structure drawing and editing software used by chemists worldwide.

items.title: Gaussian - Computational Chemistry Software
items.author: Gaussian, Inc.
items.description: Powerful software for electronic structure calculations including DFT, ab initio, and semi-empirical methods.

items.title: JMOL - Molecular Viewer
items.author: Open Source Community
items.description: Free, open-source molecular viewer for 3D chemical structures and crystal structures.
